snippet: Tom Durkin will retire from calling horse races in August at Saratoga after a 43-year career that included announcing Triple Crown and Breeders’ Cup races.
abstract: Tom Durkin will retire from calling horse races at Saratoga after a 43-year career that included announcing Triple Crown and Breeders’ Cup races.
lead_paragraph: Tom Durkin will retire from calling horse races in August at Saratoga after a 43-year career that included announcing Triple Crown and Breeders’ Cup races.

headline.main: Longtime Horse Racing Announcer to Retire
